Description:
Coffee is not exactly a traditional dim sum drunk, but it's a common offering with Hong Kong breakfasts and lunches, particularly at Hong Kong-style cafes (cha chaan teng).

**Characters**

This is a loan word -- the pronunciation (ga fē in Cantonese, kā fēi in Mandarin) sounds more or less like *coffee*.

 The first character [咖 ](https://en.wiktionary.org/wiki/咖) is similarly used in the word for another loan wordcurry, 咖喱 (ga lēi).
